elephant: I need to go to New York on 20th, plan a trip for me

subTasks.description: Research and book flight tickets to New York
Research and book accommodations in New York
Research and arrange transportation from the airport to the accommodation in New York
Research and create a list of attractions and landmarks to visit in New York
Research and plan the daily activities and schedule for the trip in New York
Research and identify restaurants and cafes for meals and snacks during the trip in New York
Check and ensure that all necessary travel documents (e.g., passport, ID) are valid and up to date
Make a packing list of essential items for the trip to New York (e.g., clothing, toiletries, medications)
Purchase any required travel gear or accessories needed for the trip to New York (e.g., travel adapters, cameras)
Estimate and create a budget for the trip to New York, including expenses such as transportation, accommodation, meals, activities, and souvenirs
Research and explore available payment options in New York (e.g., credit cards, currency exchange)
Notify the bank of the travel dates and destinations to avoid any issues with using cards abroad.
